forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 19C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 66F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Areas of fog developing with patchy drizzle possible. Low near 10C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Areas of fog developing with patchy drizzle possible. Low around 50F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of morning fog with some patchy drizzle. Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 18C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Areas of fog developing with patchy drizzle possible. Low near 10C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Areas of fog developing with patchy drizzle possible. Low around 50F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of morning fog with some patchy drizzle. Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 18C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of morning fog with some patchy drizzle. Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High around 65F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High near 20C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 67F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 48F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 22C. SE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 71F. SE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 9C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 49F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 23C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 72F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h, becoming SE and decreasing to 5 to 10 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 49F. WNW winds shifting to SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 21C. SSE winds shifting to W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High around 70F. SSE winds shifting to W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
